body:
Comment 7 by **johan.samyn**: 
You don't see any results when running 'set | find "%"' because those vars have already
been expanded before being presented to the set command, and so cannot be detected this
way. You can see them when looking at the values for those env vars as they are
registered, using regedit or some 3th party tool. That's where I picked up that habit.
But it seems this is kind of reserved to the OS and some specialised tools. So I'd
better avoid doing it myself.

Johan
